text: Hey, what are you doing? Take your hand away~~
Y-You moved the mouse to the wrong place!
What are you trying to do?
Meow meow meow?
So scary (ノ≧∇≦)ノ
Molestation! Help!
If you keep this up, I’ll have to use force!
I’m going to get angry!
Don’t touch me like that!
Y-You’re really shameless!
Hentai!
Guess what I’m going to say?
I learned a lot of life experience from the Frog Prince.
Wanna play Asteroids?
This button says “Do Not Click”.
What, do you want to play a game with me?
I heard this can make you dance!
Don’t you love me anymore? Wuwuwu~
Do you want to meet my big sister?
Want to see my little sister?
Switch the mascot?
Do you like dress-up play?
What role should I play this time?
Transformation!
Let’s see what happens next!
You want to take a photo of me? One, two, three~ cheese~
How about taking a picture together?
Just keep smiling~
Want to know more about me?
This records my moving history.
What do you want to know about me?
Is it time to say goodbye?
Wuwu QAQ, see you next time…
Don’t abandon me…
Will we meet again…?
Hmph, you’ll regret this!

seasons.text: It’s New Year’s Day! A new year begins — it’s {year} now~
Another Valentine’s Day — did you find a partner in {year}?
Today is Tree Planting Day, protect the environment!
Let me tell you a secret~ Today is April Fools’ Day, don’t get fooled~
It’s Labor Day — any plans for the holiday?
It’s Children’s Day — happy times are short, wish we could stay young forever…
Victory Day of the War of Resistance Against Japan — remember history, cherish peace.
It’s Teachers’ Day, remember to greet your teachers!
National Day is here — celebrating our motherland!
Who are you spending Singles’ Day with this year~?
It’s Christmas — my owner must be shopping like crazy again~

time.text: Good morning! A day’s plan starts in the morning — a beautiful day begins~
Good morning! Work going well? Don’t sit too long, get up and move around!
It’s noon — lunch time after a busy morning!
Afternoons make you sleepy — did you finish today’s exercise goal?
Evening time! The sunset outside is beautiful — nothing beats the evening glow~
Good evening! How was your day?

text: It’s so late already, get some rest — good night~
Take care of your eyes late at night!

time.text: Are you a night owl? Staying up this late — can you wake up tomorrow?

default: Long time no see, time really flies…
You big meanie! You ignored me for so long, wuwuwu~
Punching your chest with tiny fists!
message.console: Haha, you opened the console — trying to see my little secrets?
